attributes.action: BBC's refusal to screen an emergency appeal for Gaza
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Protests have intensified over the BBC's refusal to screen an emergency appeal for Gaza in spite of an thousands of people that raised their voice for bbc to reverse their decision and we want primister step in and sort this mess, once up for all so then we the bbc licence payers confidence will return.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
